name: 5th International Conference on Intelligent and Fuzzy Systems
content: INFUS is an acronym for Intelligent and Fuzzy Systems. It is a well-established international research forum to advance the foundations and applications of intelligent and fuzzy systems, computational intelligence, and soft computing for applied research in general and for complex engineering and decision support systems. The principal mission of INFUS is bridging the gap between fuzzy & intelligence systems and real complex systems via joint research between universities and international research institutions, encouraging interdisciplinary research and bringing multidiscipline researchers together. INFUS Conference proceedings will be published as a book by the Springer and will be indexed in Scopus and Web of Science. Special issues of several SCI indexed journals will be devoted to a peer-refereed selection of extended papers.
